C

calculateNewX(int, int) - Method in class dkeep.logic.State
Calculates the player's new column based on the direction they're heading.
calculateNewY(int, int) - Method in class dkeep.logic.State
Calculates the player's new line based on the direction they're heading.
checkForExit() - Method in class dkeep.logic.State
Checks if the hero exited the room.
checkForKey() - Method in class dkeep.logic.State
Checks if the hero stepped on the key cell.
checkForKey(int, int) - Method in class dkeep.logic.State
Checks if the player is about to get a key.
checkIfLose() - Method in class dkeep.logic.State
Checks if the player lost (i.e. is next to an attacking entity).
checkIfWin(int, int) - Method in class dkeep.logic.State
Checks if the player is about to exit a door.
checkMove(int, int, int) - Method in class dkeep.logic.State
Checks if the move is possible.
cleanUpClubs(Ogre) - Method in class dkeep.logic.State
Removes from the board an ogre's clubs (since their movement is not always linear).
